column4: hey, can anyone tell me when firefox 3 rc1 will be added to the update list?
its alreadt added
not for me :/
do you have 8.04?
yes
when you install package "firefox" does it install firefox 2 or firefox 3?
8.04 came with firefox 3 beta 5 installed, but i want to update it to rc1
owh, sorry my fault. i thought you meant firefox beta... :$
no rc1
you know when RC1 will be added to updates?
no, i dont know that. sorry
ok
but you can download it ofcourse from mozilla's site :)
when i do that it doesn't use certain plugins
you mean like flash and java?
and other media plugins
so you need a deb package?
yea
sites like getdeb.net often have new versions, but im not sure about firefox
they don't have firefox
sorry, cant help you more.
